predictiveModeling.title: HemaPredict™ - Predictive Hematology Modeling
predictiveModeling.subtitle: Advanced AI-Driven Analytics for Hematological Intelligence
predictiveModeling.description: HemaPredict™ represents a breakthrough in hematological intelligence, moving beyond traditional analysis to enable healthcare professionals to predict patient outcomes and optimize treatment strategies.

personalized.title: Personalized Hematological Models
personalized.description: Each patient receives a unique predictive model based on their individual blood profile, medical history, and clinical context. Our AI learns from patterns specific to each patient to provide highly accurate predictions.

projections.title: Time-Based Projections
projections.description: Predict hematological parameters at key intervals (30, 60, and 90 days). Plan interventions, monitor disease progression, and adjust treatment protocols with confidence.

scenarios.title: Scenario Analysis
scenarios.description: Explore "what-if" scenarios to understand how different treatment approaches might affect patient hematological outcomes. Support evidence-based clinical decision-making.

hemaStability.title: HemaStability Score™
hemaStability.description: A proprietary composite score that quantifies the stability of a patient's hematological status. Higher scores indicate greater stability and lower risk of adverse hematological events.

report.title: Predictive Report Snapshot
report.description: Review comprehensive insights at a glance with our intuitive predictive reports.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower healthcare professionals with intelligent, predictive tools that enhance hematological assessment and improve patient outcomes through ethical, responsible AI.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a future where predictive hematology analytics are standard practice in healthcare, enabling early intervention, personalized medicine, and better outcomes for patients with hematological conditions worldwide.
